carousel.title: Mexicali Turbine Energy
carousel.description: Since 2021, our mission has been to transform the way energy is supplied worldwide. With cutting-edge technology and fast solutions, we help companies ensure energy stability.

carousel.title: Customized Energy Solutions
carousel.description: No matter the complexity of the challenge, at MTE we design tailor-made solutions to ensure an efficient and adaptable energy supply. From emergency power generation to large-scale installations.

carousel.title: Projects in 60 Days
carousel.description: At MTE, we specialize in achieving ambitious challenges. The 130.4 MW GDM project was executed in record time, ensuring a reliable power supply and setting a new standard in efficiency.

carousel.title: Energy for the Refinery
carousel.description: We implemented an innovative energy solution at the Tula Refinery, installing a temporary 20 MVA transformer in record time.

cards.title: OUR COMPANY
cards.description: Committed to excellence in construction, we offer innovative and high-quality solutions.

cards.title: OUR SERVICES
cards.description: From planning to execution, we provide construction and maintenance services with the highest standards.

cards.title: COMMITMENT
cards.description: We are dedicated to customer satisfaction with a trust-based approach, quality, and compliance.

services.title: Our Services and Solutions
services.description: At Mejicali Turbine Energy, we offer a wide range of energy solutions tailored to each client's specific needs. Our expertise and quick response capability allow us to deliver exceptional results in record time.

cards.title: Fast Energy
cards.description: We specialize in the construction, installation, commissioning, operation, and maintenance of fast-track power generation projects.

cards.title: Customized Projects
cards.description: We specialize in developing tailor-made projects, adapting each solution from scratch.

projects.title: Looking for efficient and proven energy solutions?
projects.description: We tackle major challenges with innovative solutions. Discover how we have helped our clients optimize their energy infrastructure with successful projects that ensure efficiency, speed, and reliability.

items.description: Reliable energy in record time with advanced technology.
Efficient installation of TM2500 turbines to ensure power supply.

contact.title: Reliable energy when you need it most!
contact.description: At MTE, we know that every minute counts when it comes to energy supply. That’s why we offer solutions designed to ensure a safe, efficient, and customized power supply. Our expertise in fast-track projects allows us to deliver energy infrastructure in record time without compromising quality or safety.
contact.cta: Turn challenges into opportunities. Let’s talk about your next project.

form.title: How can we help you?

contactInfo.title: Contact us:
contactInfo.address: Address: Street 38 No. 3 between 1B and 1C, Campestre Neighborhood, Office 206, Zip Code 97120, Mérida, Yucatán, Mexico.

hero-about.title: Who Are We?
hero-about.description: Since 2021, we have been revolutionizing how the world receives its energy. With cutting-edge technology and fast solutions, we provide businesses with the energy stability they need to grow without limits.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Enter the global market with innovative electric energy solutions, using diesel or natural gas, and offering capacities ranging from 10 MW to 500 MW, adapting to the specific needs of each client.

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.description: Install electric energy solutions using diesel or natural gas in less than 60 days, ensuring operational efficiency, sustainability, and technical excellence in every project.

future.title: Future
future.text: Provide energy solutions using all technologies, including next-generation ones.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Be open to new ideas and methods.

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.text: Adjust our strategies and plans based on emerging trends and market opportunities.

consistency.title: Consistency
consistency.text: Adjust our strategies and plans based on emerging trends and market opportunities.

whatDistinguishesUs.title: What Distinguishes Us?
whatDistinguishesUs.text: We offer competitive and customized solutions, using technologies that adapt to the specific needs of our clients. Our ability to combine technologies allows us to optimize results and exceed expectations.

ourHistory.title: Our History
ourHistory.text: Founded in 2021, along with our subsidiary Generación de Mejicali, the company was created to provide electric energy solutions in emergency situations. Our first major milestone was the installation of five GE TM2500 generation 6 turbines in less than 60 days, including the civil works of the site.

hero-services.title: Our Services and Solutions
hero-services.description: At Mejicali Turbine Energy, we transform challenges into tailor-made energy solutions. With a combination of innovation, experience, and speed, we offer reliable and efficient energy, adapting to the unique needs of each client. Exceptional results in record time, because energy can't wait.

panelServicies.title: Experts in Fast-Track Energy Projects
panelServicies.description: We are experts in the construction, installation, commissioning, operation, and maintenance of fast-track power generation projects. MTE has successfully developed, operated, and maintained over 260 MW of power in less than two months in Mexico and the Caribbean.
steps: Supply of turbines and step-up transformers.
Diesel and gas filtration systems, gas valves.
Transmission lines and medium and high voltage equipment.

solutions.title: Mobile Substations
solutions.description: For rapid deployment in critical situations.

solutions.description: Adapted for efficient operation in various conditions.

solutions.title: Power Generation Projects with Turbines
solutions.description: Using diesel and natural gas, with capacities from 10 MW to 500 MW.

solutions.title: Fast Installation
solutions.description: Energy solutions in less than 60 days, ensuring speed without compromising quality.

project1.heroDescription: Since 2021, our mission has been to transform the way energy is supplied worldwide. With cutting-edge technology and fast solutions, we help businesses ensure energy stability.
project1.introDescription: At Mejicali Turbine Energy, we are proud to announce the successful fulfillment of all technical, regulatory, and operational requirements established for the Commissioning of the Corrective Protocol Unit 2022 – Mejicali Generation.
project1.highlightText: The highlight of our achievement is that although the project required a capacity of 100 MW, we implemented an innovative solution that allows for generation up to 130.4 MW, exceeding initial expectations and providing greater value to the electrical system.
project1.highlightClosing: At Mejicali Turbine Energy, we remain committed to excellence in power generation, driving solutions that go beyond standards and contribute to Mexico's sustainable development.

infoData.title: Infrastructure and Advanced Equipment
infoData.description: We install all the required infrastructure, including primary equipment, advanced metering systems, state-of-the-art communication channels, and high-precision SCADA systems.

infoData.title: Regulatory Compliance
infoData.description: We comply with all regulatory requirements before CFE, CENACE, CRE, and other entities, ensuring the safe and efficient operation of the plant.

infoData.title: Testing and Energization
infoData.description: We perform pre-operational tests and successful energization, guaranteeing the reliability and optimal performance of the system.

project2.title: GDM 2021 Project
project2.description: Since 2021, our mission has been to transform the way energy is supplied worldwide. With cutting-edge technology and rapid solutions, we help companies ensure energy stability.

intro.title: GDM Project for CENACE
intro.description: MTE successfully carried out the commissioning, operation, and maintenance of 100 MW for the National Energy Control Center (CENACE) in Mexicali, Mexico.

highlights.title: Technological Advances for Secure and Efficient Energy

infoData.title: Next-Generation Power
infoData.description: Installation of four TM 2500+ aeroderivative gas turbines.

infoData.title: Strategic Electrical Infrastructure
infoData.description: Construction of a temporary electrical substation and a high-voltage step-up transformer.

infoData.title: Pure Water for Maximum Performance
infoData.description: Implementation of a demineralized water treatment plant.

infoData.title: Uninterrupted Energy
infoData.description: Black-Start system to ensure continuous power supply.

infoData.title: Expansion of the Electrical Grid
infoData.description: Construction of a 9 km transmission line, mitigating the risk of blackouts in the region.

projectScope: Interconnection to the main gas pipeline.
Construction of the transmission line, civil works, grounding systems, and site security.
Installation of step-up transformer, electrical substation, Black-Start system, and water treatment plant.

projectMoreScope.title: Fuel Supply:
projectMoreScope.description: MTE was responsible for the turnkey solution, including fuel supply.

hero.title: Palo Seco Project for USACE
hero.description: Since 2021, our mission has been to transform the way energy is supplied worldwide. With cutting-edge technology and rapid solutions, we help companies ensure energy stability.

intro.title: GDM Project for CENACE
intro.description: MTE was responsible for the logistics, installation, commissioning, operation, and maintenance of three TM 2500 aeroderivative turbines with a total capacity of 60 MW at the Palo Seco Power Plant in Puerto Rico for USACE in 2023, meeting the COD within the established timeframe.

projectDetails: Technology: GE TM2500 models (one TM 2500+ and two TM 2500)
projectScope: Transport and installation of the turbines.

projectMoreScope.title: Execution Timeframe:
projectMoreScope.description: Less than 60 days from contract signing.

hero.title: S.E. Mobile Tula Project
hero.description: Since 2021, our mission has been to transform the way energy is supplied worldwide. With cutting-edge technology and rapid solutions, we help companies ensure energy stability.

intro.title: Temporary Transformer Solution
intro.description: At Mejicali Turbine Energy, we demonstrated our versatility by implementing a temporary 20 MVA power solution for a company at the Tula Refinery. This project involved installing a temporary transformer, providing a quick and efficient response to ensure operational continuity.

scope: Installation of a temporary 20 MVA transformer.
Support infrastructure, including civil works, connection systems, and security.

projectMoreScope.title: Adaptability:
projectMoreScope.description: This approach allows us to offer our clients flexibility and scalability, ensuring that each project can grow and evolve according to future demands.
